name: Insight (itch) (CallMeWhatever, TurtelLord)
description:
In the 3D story-adventure game "Insight", the player takes on the role of Alex,
who is plagued by worries and fears. Trapped in her own mind, it is up to you,
together with Alex's quick-witted stuffed dragon Tato, to confront her fears
and stand by her during a difficult decision in her life.

Travel room by room through the world of her thoughts and discover episodes
from her past that still influence Alex today. By solving interactive puzzles,
collecting objects, and exploring the rooms, you gradually piece together her
story to escape from the world of thoughts.

Are you ready to immerse yourself in Alex's story?

Project Information

This game was collaboratively developed by a team
of eight students over the course of one semester.

The aim of the project is to provide individuals with
an interest in mental health with a playful insight into
a topic from this field.

Website: https://insight-game.myportfolio.com/
